key_risks: Regulatory dependence and potential delays or rejections in approvals
Reimbursement challenges, particularly in international markets
High stock volatility and lowered revenue guidance
Increasing competition from alternative organ preservation technologies
Leadership transition with a new CFO lacking public company experience
controversies: Potential ethical concerns over high costs limiting accessibility to OCS systems
Investor uncertainty due to recent stock performance and financial guidance adjustments
environmental_issues: Limited data on environmental impact of OCS systems and operations
social_issues: Balancing high costs with equitable access to organ transplantation technology
Variability in adoption rates among transplant centers due to cost and training barriers
governance_issues: Compliance risks in navigating complex regulatory environments (FDA, EMA)
Execution of financial strategy under new CFO leadership
